卯.definition: mortise (slot cut into wood to receive a tenon); 4th earthly branch: 5-7 a.m., 2nd solar month (6th March-4th April), Year of the Rabbit; ancient Chinese compass point: 90° (east); (coll.) to concentrate one's strength (variant of 鉚|铆[mao3])

卯時.definition: 5-7 am (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)

卯榫.definition: mortise and tenon (slot and tab forming a carpenter's joint)

卯起來.definition: (coll.) to get enthusiastic; to put in all one's energy
